name: Slide me a Cold Brew
description:
By Gillian O. and Julia R. 

You play a waitress at a coffee shop, and your job is to slide the customers their drinks. But be careful, because they’ll get angry if you take too long! Try to serve as many customers as possible before too many of them leave.

Controls: 

Use the arrow keys to move. Use the space bar to pick up drinks from the bar in the top right corner, as well as to slide the drinks to the three tables on the left.
developers: NYU Game Center - High School Programs
